contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Kanada'''|金田町|Kanada-machi}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Tagawa District, Fukuoka|Tagawa District]], [[Fukuoka Prefecture|Fukuoka]], [[Japan]]. On March 6, 2006 Kanada was merged with the towns of [[Akaike, Fukuoka|Akaike]] and [[Hōjō, Fukuoka|Hōjō]], both from [[Tagawa District, Fukuoka|Tagawa District]], to form the new town of [[Fukuchi, Fukuoka|Fukuchi]]. As of 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 8,285 and a [[population density|density]] of 1,110.59 persons per km². The total area was 7.46 km². ==External links== * [http://www.town.fukuchi.lg.jp/index.php/ Fukuchi official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Fukuoka Prefecture]] [[Category:Populated places disestablished in 2006]] {{Fukuoka-geo-stub}}
